description: Displays a list of categories for all event source types, or, if specified, for a specified source type. You can also see this list in the 'Amazon RDS event categories and event messages' section of the Amazon RDS User Guide or the Amazon Aurora User Guide.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of source that is generating the events. For RDS Proxy events, specify db-proxy. Valid Values: db-instance | db-cluster | db-parameter-group | db-security-group | db-snapshot | db-cluster-snapshot | db-proxy.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: This parameter isn't currently supported. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. The following actions can be filtered: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks DescribeDBClusterEndpoints DescribeDBClusters DescribeDBInstances DescribeDBRecommendations DescribeDBShardGroups DescribePendingMaintenanceActions The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

nested_items.name: EventCategoriesMapList
nested_items.description: A list of EventCategoriesMap data types.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The source type that the returned categories belong to.

nested_items.name: EventCategories
nested_items.description: The event categories for the specified source type.
